description:
Do you want to learn easy steps to writing a book, publishing your book and making money from the sale of your book? You are in the right place because this high quality and interactive course by Louise Anne Maurice of 90 Day Guru E-Learning was created for you and recently updated April 1, 2016.

How to Write a Book: How to Self Publish a Book Sell Books is for you if:

  • You see the money making and marketing potential of writing a book but you want the best step-by-step guidance for how to get started writing a book.
  • You want book writing best practices, book writing templates and simple writing formulas for writing a non-fiction book and have already been tested and proven to work.
  • You would like free and simple ways to get your book published quickly and easily so that you can use it as a marketing tool to boost your current business.
  • You would like to know how you can self publish a book without spending thousands of dollars.
  • You are ready to develop a simple marketing plan to easily sell books online.
  • You are committed to following through with what you're about to learn.

**************************************************************************************************************

Why take How to Write a Book, How to Self Publish a Book and Sell Books?

  • This is why you are here because you want to know how to write a book, get that book published and sell that book in the shortest amount of time without it costing you a small fortune.
  • The best part is; every piece of advice, strategy and logical approach to book writing, book publishing and book sales has been tested; none of this is theory.

*****************************************************************************************************************

What is covered in How to Write a Book, How to Self Publish a Book and Sell Books?

  1. Learn inside tips to making the most of this course so you write your books, publish your book and sell your book in the shortest amount of time possible.
  2. Insider tips for how to write a good book. You get our writing a book plan, complete with book writing template plus tips on how to write books titles so you can write a book that sells.
  3. Discover how to publish an ebook and how to publish your own book plus receive hands-on step-by-step guidance that shows you exactly what to do at every stage of the publishing process.
  4. Step-by-step guide on how to sell books, how to market your book and how to sell books online
  5. Walk away with a clear understanding of book cover design plus a completed book cover for your book using free online resources.
  6. Receive book coaching and consulting that guides you through the obstacles that stop most people from writing a book and helps you connect with your writing genius
  7. Follow a simple formula for book writing, book publishing and book sales that you can follow and implement for ongoing success as an Author.

*****************************************************************************************************************

How does How to Write a Book, How to Self Publish a Book and Sell Books benefit you?

  • I understand how to write a book that sets you up for success. I became a self-published Kindle Author in 2013. I have written several books that not only sell online but market the other aspects of my online business without me doing any work.
  • In this course, you learn the exact steps you need to know to write a good book in a short amount of time.
  • You receive a book writing formula that you can follow for success.
  • You get self publishing and book sales insights that only a professional with my background can give you.
  • You get the inside track on what you need to do to succeed online as an Author plus what you need to do to follow through.
  • If that's something you would like to achieve, you have selected the right course to take. If you complete this entire course and implement everything you learn you will have a completed published book with a marketing plan that you can follow to sell those books online.
  • Remember, it doesn't matter if you are new or already in full swing, I've been there and I can show you exactly what you need to do to make it happen.
